name: data-gateway-service
description: Provides a GraphQL API by acting as a microservices data access layer
author: Bogdan Balan <bogdan.balan@thinslices.com>

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && aws cloudformation package --template-file infrastructure/template.yaml --output-template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --s3-bucket foobarfizzbuzz
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name data-gateway-fizzbuzz --parameter-overrides Environment=development
